text:
@RobertJenrick We all followed the rules because we wanted to stop the spread of #COVIDー19 & save lives.If we did what we "believed was reasonable and within the rules" our NHS would be overwhelmed & even more deaths.We followed YOUR GOVERNMENT message,Cummings did not.
https://t.co/cuUTInilwT https://t.co/Pe2G71ifIw
